scripts.prefix:css: npx  postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' css/style.comp.css -o css/style.prefix.css
scripts.compress:css: npx sass css/style.prefix.css css/style.css --style compressed --load-path node_modules
scripts.build:css: npx run-s compile:sass prefix:css compress:css compile:privacidade
